attributes.title: Official Review
attributes.review: I had such high hopes for this app. I was truly disappointed. I was thinking it would include discussions on his political stances. And what more he would do in his second term. Instead all this app had was videos of a racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic rip off of Chester the Cheeto talking about how attractive young girls are. Truly disappointed.

attributes.title: My Phone Asked Me Why I Hated It When I Installed This
attributes.review: This is a great app, the very best app, people say all the time they tell this app, App! You’re the best! and it says I know! It’s got all the best features, the very best, you see, it’s just, there’s features in this app you never saw before, the best features, they do everything.

attributes.title: Offensive Content
attributes.review: When I opened the app, I was greeted with an orange-skinned man. My brother just happened to be walking by me and caught a glimpse of this. He almost passed out! So, if you’re going to show such images you might as well put a warning before we download it! What the heck is wrong with you!!!! 😡😡😡

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I got the app hoping to look for news about trump but I saw a weird and disturbing picture of Chester in a bra eating a Cheeto it was disgusting. Also there is so much fake news and glitches and ads. I told my family about all the news and they didn’t believe a word I said.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This ugly man just showed up on my screen when I opened the app not to mention he held his fist up? I can only imagine it was in reply to one of the other white men shouting “WHITE POWER” but idk I’m only going off of what he retweets. But I am very concerned for his wife malaria. Hey malaria if you’re out there blink twice if you need help.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review:
Please don’t get this app it is terrible and it’s slow af the ads are unbelievable and the orange thing called trump 🤮 is boring and doesn’t know how to grow up😡

0/5 because I much rather play one of the games that they always advertise after a post on instagram thank you very much
😌💅🏽

attributes.title: I do not recommend
attributes.review: This app caused my phone to run very slowly and I would get up to 65 notifications a day and I wouldn’t see the important notifications (like texts from my parents etc) because they get all jumbled into one big cluster of notifications

attributes.title: No thank you❤️
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of getting more information on what going on in the country. I however was extremely disappointed and disgusted when I opened the app to see a nude photo of our president🤮 they really weren’t kidding when they said this app was 17+ DO BETTER bunker boy✨

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!
attributes.review: i had downloaded the app as i thought i would be getting info about politics BUT NO😜😜😾😾.... i open it and i see an orange cheeto saying "OOGA BOOGA😹🤬" and i was appalled! Though it didnt stop there.. as I was going through the app I started to see provocative images of zuko 🔥 and aang 💨 and i was like TURNNNN IT UPPPP😈😹💯! Anyways everyone what yall want from the corner store🍌🍒🍅🧅🧄🍞🥯🥖 🏬 ...

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and found that I saw the all the information, and I did not like it. It caused my cat to do 360s in the air, and made my brother to backflips because it flipped him out. Then my phone exploded from the amount of Orange I saw. I do not recommend the app to any user just to protect their innocent eyes.
